item.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Promises Paid Robotaxis Next Year
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk on Wednesday said the electric vehicle maker will roll out driverless ride-hailing services to the public in California and Texas next year, a claim likely to face significant regulatory and technical challenges.

item.title: 'Call of Duty' To Release Tomorrow As Microsoft Pushes For Gaming Supremacy
item.description: Microsoft bought the game's publisher Activision-Blizzard a year ago for $69 billion in the sector's biggest takeover.

item.title: "India Is Very, Very Dear To World's Computer Industry": Nvidia CEO
item.description: India, a country "dear" to the world's computer industry, is set to witness 20 times growth in compute capacities in 2024, and will soon be exporting impactful AI solutions, Nvidia founder and CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday.

item.title: Nvidia Rolls Out Hindi-Language AI Model
item.description: Chip behemoth Nvidia launched a lightweight artificial intelligence model on Thursday for India's widely-used Hindi language, as it looks to tap into a growing market for AI technologies.

item.title: Peloton to sell discounted Bike+ at Costco for a limited time
‘God works in mysterious ways’: I became a Nvidia millionaire playing ‘World of Warcraft.’ Am I smart — or just lucky?
Feds clear way for EVTOL startups to bring flying vehicles to U.S. airspace
Chinese EV travels over 550 miles on single charge thanks to revolutionary battery — here's how it could influence the American auto industry
The Ultenic U10 cordless vacuum cleaner is down by $89.99 at Amazon
item.description: The Ultenic U10 Ultra cordless stick vacuum cleaner usually retails for $189.99, but Amazon has it on sale for $99 as of Oct. 24.

item.title: The real AI update: Apple launches iOS 18.2 developer beta
item.description: Apple has started seeding iOS 18.2 beta and iPadOS 18.2 beta to developers, bringing a number of new Apple Intelligence features.

item.title: I tested the new GoPro Hero 13 Black by land and sea
item.description: The new GoPro Hero 13 Black is a more-than 4K action camera with new pro features, including the return of GPS and brand-new lens mods.

item.title: Get a refurbished yet powerful HP EliteBook on sale for $320 and upgrade your work setup
item.description: This refurbished HP EliteBook 840 G5 is on sale for $90 off and features an Intel i5 processor, 16GB RAM, and a 256GB SSD. It's a perfect pick for work or school.

item.title: Take 59% off this AI app and apply for jobs with one click
item.description: LazyApply makes job hunting easy, automating applications with one click to help you land interviews without the stress. Get lifetime access to the app for just $59.97.
